videos.headline: Southern Illinois WR makes leaping  catch for 36-yard TD
videos.description: Sam Straub rises up for impressive touchdown catch.

videos.headline: Southern Illionois QB takes hit, still completes TD pass
videos.description: Sam Straub completes 9-yard TD pass under duress.

videos.headline: Memphis TE hauls in TD catch to even the score
videos.description: Joey Magnicico keeps foot in for 9-yard touchdown

videos.headline: Southern Illinois WR takes short catch all the way for TD
videos.description: Darrell James makes cuts back   for 33-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Memphis WR Williams long grab puts them in red zone
videos.description: Riley Ferguson delivers big reception to John Williams.

videos.headline: Memphis returns kickoff 100-yards for TD
videos.description: Tony Pollard goes the entire field for touchdown

videos.headline: Southern Illinois QB throws short TD pass
videos.description: Sam Straub finds Jaylon Graham for the touchdown pass to make it a one score game.
